duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather business requirements and migrate existing SharePoint sites with Nintex workflows from On-Premises instance to SharePoint Online with Power Automate workflows.
Develop Power Automate flows to automate processes and drive efficiencies.
Configure and implement Power Automate (Flow) and SharePoint Online Site Administration.
Create deployment strategy for SharePoint Online and Power Platform, and design solutions based on established patterns and best practices.
Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical staff, and translate business requirements into technical solutions.

Migrate from On-Prem SharePoint to SharePoint Online, develop in MS PowerApps Portal with Dataverse, create views in Dataverse, and convert legacy InfoPath Forms, SharePoint Designer workflows, and Nintex forms and workflows to leverage Power Platform tools.
Apply strong technical writing skills in documentation and reporting.
